title: "sds-www"
output: github_document

SDS content for the web not managed by college relations, available at https://smithcollege-sds.github.io/sds-www/

In order to edit this website:

1. The layout/style is based on `www/_site.yml`
1. The contents are based on all `.Rmd` files in the `www/` folder

In order to build this website:

1. If you haven't already
    + Install the `sds` package following these [instructions](https://github.com/SmithCollege-SDS/sds)
    + Install the `bannerweb` package
1. Using Terminal/command line
    + Navigate to `www/`
    + Run `make`

The resulting `docs/` folder will contain all `.html` files
